item.title: Report X-2025030798
item.description:
Report X-2025030798

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-22T21:13:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-13
  • City: MEMPHIS
  • State: TN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: A fiberboard box with signs of a release was discovered during sort operations at the MEMH location. The fiberboard box contained two metal paint cans with positive closure rings both rings were damaged. One can the lid opened up and spilled all of its contents. The shipment was placed into a steel salvage package and a new declaration will be obtained for movement.

item.title: Report X-2025030797
item.description:
Report X-2025030797

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-22T21:13:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-04
  • City: MEMPHIS
  • State: TN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: During sort operations at the MEMH location a damaged fiberboard box was discovered. The fiberboard box contained thirteen metal canisters packaged with plastic molds and Styrofoam padding. One of the canisters discharged its contents the other twelve were intact. the shipment was placed into a steel salvage package and a new declaration will be obtained for movement.

item.title: Report E-2025030167
item.description:
Report E-2025030167

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-16T21:12:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-11
  • City: NASHVILLE
  • State: TN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 21500
  • Serious Incident Ind: Yes
  • Description: XPO-Logistics contacted ERTS regarding a punctured tote containing hazardous product, BONDERITE C-AK ZX-1 ALKALINE CLEANER. A contractor dispatched and observed an estimated 200-gallon release onto the concrete dock floor and parking lot in a 100’x70’ area as a result of a forklift puncture. Oil dry was applied to the released material and a tote transfer was performed for the residual product left inside of the damaged tote. In total, 23 drums of waste were generated from this response that were taken by the contractor and staged at their location for waste management. The customer refused the new tote with the transferred product, so XPO staged the tote in the waste area for waste disposal. No storm-drains, waterways, or soil were involved in this incident.

item.title: Report X-2025030401
item.description:
Report X-2025030401

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-16T21:12:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-10
  • City: NASHVILLE
  • State: TN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Undeclared hazmat. Torn box. 40lb / 18.1kg plastic drum (removable lid) of Bioguard Silk Guard Complete Multi-Benefit 3" Chlorinating Tablets lost 2lb of powder from loose lid. No orientation arrows, DOT labels/markings on outer box. Note: this exceeds the 11lb/5kg threshold for Packing Group III in 49CFR173.155(b)(2) found here: https://www.ecfr.gov/current/title-49/subtitle-B/chapter-I/subchapter-C/part-173/subpart-D/section-173.155

  • Hazmat Injuries: 0

  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: A fiber board box was present to the MEMH spill office with an odor. While investigating the shipment the spill agent discovered that the lid of the single metal can inside had opened causing a release. The shipment was placed into a steel salvage package and a new declaration will be obtained for movement.

item.title: Report X-2025030203
item.description:
Report X-2025030203

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-16T21:12:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-23
  • City: MEMPHIS
  • State: TN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 2/23/2025 at approximately 1730 hours, Dangerous Goods Administration received a call from Employee 658069 at the hub facility in Memphis, reporting a dangerous goods spill. The shipment consisted of one steel drum, which was compromised during the sort. The drum was creased to the point that a small amount of the substance leaked out. The cause of the damage was unknown. The shipment was placed in a salvage drum and awaits an amended shipper's declaration for further transport.

item.title: Report X-2025030454
item.description:
Report X-2025030454

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-16T21:12:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-17
  • City: MEMPHIS
  • State: TN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Pkg Info ( TRK NBR=7349734990637931 PKG TYPE=Package (box/drum/jerrican/composite) PHY STATE=No Release TRANSPORTATION PHASE=In Transit ) Commodity Info ( UNDG NBR=UN1263 CLASS=30 PSN TEXT=PAINT PKG GRP=III SPILLED QTY=0 TECH NAME=PAINT )Pkg Info ( TRK NBR=734990637953 PKG TYPE=Package (box/drum/jerrican/composite) PHY STATE=No Release TRANSPORTATION PHASE=In Transit ) Commodity Info ( UNDG NBR=UN1263 CLASS=30 PSN TEXT=PAINT PKG GRP=III SPILLED QTY=0 CONTAINER CAPACITY=24 CONTAINER UOM=Liquid - Liter MATERIAL CONSTRUCTION=A - Metal (any type) NUMBER IN SHIPMENT=1 NUMBER FAILED=1 INNER PKG TYPE=5 - Cylinder TOTAL AMT IN EACH CONTAINER=8 TOTAL UOM=Liquid - Liter TECH NAME=PAINT )Pkg Info ( TRK NBR=734990637964 PKG TYPE=Package (box/drum/jerrican/composite) PHY STATE=No Release TRANSPORTATION PHASE=In Transit ) Commodity Info ( UNDG NBR=1263 CLASS=30 PSN TEXT=PAINT PKG GRP=III SPILLED QTY=0 TECH NAME=PAINT )A wooden skid with four steel drums was struck by a forklift during sort operations at the MEMH location. Thee of the drums were dented but no release but the fourth one the cap on the drum came of spilling the contents. All four of the drums were placed into steel salvage packages and a new declaration will be obtained for movement.
